name: canvastriangles
description: When I was taking a shower I saw inspiration at the label of my shampoo. Yeah, really! There were some semitransparent, overlapped triangles in few variations. I thought >Damn, it could be quite funny animation if it was on website... wait... I can do it!

scripts.build: cd dist && rmdir /S /Q js && mkdir js && cd .. && babel ./src/js -s -d ./dist/js

author: Kamil Rogala <contact@kamilrogala.it> (https://kamilrogala.it)
